trans-unit.source: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control has failed.
trans-unit.target: Inserido em uma página da Web como um espaço reservado quando a tentativa de carregar ou criar uma nova instância de um controle dinâmico <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> falha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that could not be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe é usada pelo controle Web Parts definido como um espaço reservado para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle não pôde ser adicionado à página.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method, and inserts an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the control that failed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle tenta carregar ou criar uma nova instância de um dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle em uma zona e o tentativa falhar por algum motivo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> , em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> método e insere um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle no lugar do controle que falhou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle é inserido para preservar preexistentes personalização informações de estado que podem ter existido em um controle para os usuários.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que haja um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle que tem uma propriedade personalizable, para que os usuários possam salvar seus próprios código postal e, em seguida, o controle pode exibir automaticamente informações sobre o tempo para que o código postal sempre que o usuário visita a página.

trans-unit.source: If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved.
trans-unit.target: Se em algum momento ocorrer um problema com o controle de tempo para que ele não pode ser carregado durante uma solicitação específica e ainda o restante da página carregado com êxito, os dados de personalização personalizado que um usuário tiver salvo para que controle seriam perdido na próxima vez em que os dados de personalização para a página é salva.

trans-unit.source: By inserting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected.
trans-unit.target: Inserindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle no lugar do controle com falha, você pode notificar o usuário que ocorreu um problema e também fornecem um mecanismo para o controle de Web Parts definido para preservar os dados de personalização do usuário no controle com falha até que o problema pode ser corrigido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> da classe, como um dos vários tipos projetados para ser temporários espaços reservados para outros tipos.

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses its public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma instância da classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle usa seu público <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object if present.
trans-unit.target: O construtor requer vários detalhes do controle a ser passado a ele, como a ID, o tipo original do controle com falha (se o controle de falhas é um servidor ou controle de usuário é encapsulado em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto), o caminho original para o arquivo de origem para o controle (se o controle de falhas é um controle de usuário) e a ID de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto se estiver presente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has a single public property called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe tem uma única propriedade pública chamada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores podem atribuir um valor para essa propriedade que será exibida em uma página da Web quando o controle é inserido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has three protected methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe tem três métodos protegidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes style characteristics from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains the control that failed to load.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> método usa as características de estilo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> de objeto para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zona que contém o controle que não pôde ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Se as configurações de estilo existirem neste objeto, o método se aplica a eles o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets several important inherited properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> método define várias propriedades herdadas importantes sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle, para impedir que usuários Personalizando o controle ocultando, minimizando, editar, ou exportá-lo ou alterando seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the value of the string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> método codifica o valor da cadeia de caracteres de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propriedade, para evitar problemas de processamento ou ataques de script.

trans-unit.source: The conditions in which an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance.
trans-unit.target: As condições em que um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle realmente é inserido em uma página são relativamente rara e, embora a classe pode ser herdada de e estendida, alguns desenvolvedores encontrará esse seja de grande importância.

trans-unit.source: One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um motivo, talvez você queira estender essa classe é se você deseja personalizar a aparência e comportamento do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, and set additional style or other properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, beyond those that are already set.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> método e estilo adicionais do conjunto ou outras propriedades de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, além das que já estão definidas.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exigir a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle para usar um personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, você também deve herdar do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe e substituir seu <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.
trans-unit.target: Nesse método, você deve atribuir o valor do método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parâmetro para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propriedade personalizados <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, porque o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle chama esse método em vários outros locais e geralmente passa em uma valor de mensagem de erro diferente.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é a ID do controle (não a ID exclusiva) do controle com falha.

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> estiver envolvido na falha, a ID será a ID do controle de servidor filho.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é o nome do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do controle com falha.

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> estiver envolvido na falha, o nome do tipo será o tipo do controle de servidor filho.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho para um controle de usuário, se um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> que contém um controle de usuário filho estiver envolvido na falha.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que retorna a ID de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, se esse tipo de controle estava envolvido na falha ao carregar ou criar um controle.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é necessário para controles que não herdam a classe base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controlar quando ele falha na tentativa de carregar ou criar uma instância de um dinâmico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Controles dinâmicos são controles que são adicionados a uma página programaticamente ou por um usuário que adiciona o controle de um catálogo de controles, em vez de controles estáticos que são declarados na marcação de uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> método simplesmente cria uma instância da classe base, transmitindo a ele os quatro parâmetros que contêm informações sobre o controle com falha.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the HTML output to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contém a saída HTML a ser renderizada.

trans-unit.source: Applies special error style attributes to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica atributos de estilo de erro especiais a um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> que é inserido em uma página no lugar de outro controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> método usa as características de estilo (se houver) que são definidos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zona que contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: The styles are applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: Os estilos são aplicados para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle antes da renderização.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído em uma derivada <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> de classe, se quiser que os desenvolvedores personalizar as características de estilo que são aplicadas a um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exigir a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle para usar um personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, você também deve herdar do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe e substituir seu <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: Nesse método, você deve atribuir o valor do método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parâmetro para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propriedade personalizados <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, porque o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle chama esse método em vários outros locais e geralmente passa em uma mensagem de erro específica.

trans-unit.source: Sets several important properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.
trans-unit.target: Define várias propriedades importantes no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> antes da renderização para impedir que usuários personalizem o controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> método define propriedades em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle antes de ser processada.

trans-unit.source: These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades impedir que os usuários ocultem, minimizando, edição, ou exportando o controle ou alterando seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: However, users can close or delete an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control instance.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os usuários podem fechar ou excluir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> instância do controle.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in an inherited <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído em uma herdadas <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores talvez queira substituir o método para definir propriedades adicionais sobre o controle, como um padrão <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exigir a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle para usar um personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, você também deve herdar do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe e substituir seu <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: Nesse método, você deve atribuir o valor do método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parâmetro para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propriedade personalizados <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, porque o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle chama esse método em vários outros locais e geralmente passa em uma mensagem de erro específica.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem de erro que é exibida em uma página da Web no lugar de um controle que não pode ser adicionado com êxito à página.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto da mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a culture-specific error message.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma mensagem de erro específica da cultura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted into a page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propriedade pode receber um valor por um desenvolvedor, para que seja exibida uma mensagem de erro personalizada no ponto em que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controle é inserido em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a default value to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property by extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class and, in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> constructor or in an overridden <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, assigning a default value to the property.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores podem atribuir um valor padrão para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propriedade estendendo o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> classe e, no <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> construtor ou em uma substituição <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> método, atribuindo um valor padrão para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exigir a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle para usar um personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, você também deve herdar do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe e substituir seu <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: Nesse método, você deve atribuir o valor do método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parâmetro para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propriedade personalizados <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controle, porque o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controle chama esse método em vários outros locais e geralmente passa em uma mensagem de erro específica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that encodes the error message.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que codifica a mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: Encodes the string value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Codifica o valor da cadeia de caracteres da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the string assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> método codifica a cadeia de caracteres atribuída para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propriedade para garantir que ele renderiza corretamente e para proteger contra ataques de injeção de script.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface and calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> e chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método é adicionado somente para implementar a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle acompanha o status das próprias alterações.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle de Web Parts é responsável por determinar quando o controle é considerado alterado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
